biotools.summary: An acronym for the project "A pipeline for the discovery, sustainable production and commercial utilisation of known and novel high-value triterpenes with new or superior biological activities”. This is an EU-funded collaborative project on establishing an integrative and innovative pipeline for the exploitation of plant triterpenes.

bioschemas.name: TriForC Database
